channel.title: Structure Visualization on Narendra Kumar
channel.description: Recent content in Structure Visualization on Narendra Kumar

item.title: MODPROPEP
item.description: MODPROPEP is a structure based program for analysis and prediction of substrates for protein kinases and MHC proteins
